languages.text: "В последнее время они демонстрируют спесь и неуважение ко мне. Желают возвыситься в глазах архонта и принизить меня. Ставят свои безвкусные танцы с мясом выше моего искусства! Заявляются в мою обитель, чтобы поглазеть на сокровенные тайны! Стоит напомнить Прорве, что ведьмы тоже могут кровоточить".

"Lately, they have shown arrogance and disrespect toward me. They want to rise in the eyes of the Archon and belittle me. They rank their tasteless flesh dances above my art! They come to my abode to gawk at my treasured secrets! It is time the Chasm was reminded that Wyches, too, can bleed."
languages.original_text: "В последнее время они демонстрируют спесь и неуважение ко мне. Желают возвыситься в глазах архонта и принизить меня. Ставят свои безвкусные танцы с мясом выше моего искусства! Заявляются в мою обитель, чтобы поглазеть на сокровенные тайны! Стоит напомнить Прорве, что ведьмы тоже могут кровоточить".

traits.locale_text: "They are demonstrating increasing amounts of arrogance and disrespect as of late. They want to elevate themselves in the Archon's eyes and belittle me. They put their tasteless meat dances before my art! They come to my abode to pry into my treasured secrets! It is time the Chasm was reminded that Wyches, too, can bleed."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

They put their tasteless meat dances before my art! They come to my abode to pry into my treasured secrets! It is time the Chasm was reminded that Wyches, too, can bleed."

languages.text: « Depuis peu, ils font preuve d'arrogance et de manque de respect à mon encontre. Ils veulent gagner l'estime de l'archonte à mes dépens. Ils pensent que leurs danses de mauvais goût sont supérieures à mon art ! Ils s'invitent dans ma demeure pour tenter de s'emparer de mes secrets les plus précieux ! Il est temps que l'Abîme se souvienne que les Cérastes aussi peuvent saigner. »
languages.original_text: "Lately, they have shown arrogance and disrespect toward me. They want to rise in the eyes of the Archon and belittle me. They rank their tasteless flesh dances above my art! They come to my abode to gawk at my treasured secrets! It is time the Chasm was reminded that Wyches, too, can bleed."

traits.locale_text: « Depuis peu, ils font preuve d'arrogance et de manque de respect à mon encontre. Ils veulent gagner l'estime de l'archonte à mes dépens. Ils pensent que leurs danses de mauvais goût sont supérieures à mon art ! Ils s'invitent dans ma demeure pour tenter de s'emparer de mes secrets les plus précieux ! Il est temps que l'Abîme se souvienne que les Cérastes aussi peuvent saigner. »
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: “他们最近对我的态度相当傲慢，缺乏尊重。他们打算在执政官面前贬低我，以此抬高他们自己。他们将无味的血肉之舞凌驾于我的艺术之上！他们来到我的居所，目不转睛地盯着我珍藏的秘密！是时候让裂隙明白了，就算是巫灵教派的人，也一样会流血。”
languages.original_text: "Lately, they have shown arrogance and disrespect toward me. They want to rise in the eyes of the Archon and belittle me. They rank their tasteless flesh dances above my art! They come to my abode to gawk at my treasured secrets! It is time the Chasm was reminded that Wyches, too, can bleed."

traits.locale_text: “他们最近对我的态度相当傲慢，缺乏尊重。他们打算在执政官面前贬低我，以此抬高他们自己。他们将无味的血肉之舞凌驾于我的艺术之上！他们来到我的居所，目不转睛地盯着我珍藏的秘密！是时候让裂隙明白了，就算是巫灵教派的人，也一样会流血。”
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: "In letzter Zeit haben sie sich mir gegenüber arrogant und respektlos verhalten. Sie wollen in den Augen der Archontin aufsteigen und mich herabsetzen. Sie glauben, ihre geschmacklosen Fleischtänze seien meiner Kunst überlegen! Sie kommen in mein Reich, um meine wertvollen Geheimnisse zu begaffen! Die Kluft muss daran erinnert werden, dass auch Hekatari bluten können."
languages.original_text: "Lately, they have shown arrogance and disrespect toward me. They want to rise in the eyes of the Archon and belittle me. They rank their tasteless flesh dances above my art! They come to my abode to gawk at my treasured secrets! It is time the Chasm was reminded that Wyches, too, can bleed."

traits.locale_text: "In letzter Zeit haben sie sich mir gegenüber arrogant und respektlos verhalten. Sie wollen in den Augen der Archontin aufsteigen und mich herabsetzen. Sie glauben, ihre geschmacklosen Fleischtänze seien meiner Kunst überlegen! Sie kommen in mein Reich, um meine wertvollen Geheimnisse zu begaffen! Die Kluft muss daran erinnert werden, dass auch Hekatari bluten können."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: «Últimamente, han sido arrogantes e irrespetuosas conmigo. Quieren ganarse el favor del Arconte y menospreciarme. ¡Consideran sus insulsas obras cárnicas mejores que las mías! ¡Vienen a mi morada a investigar mis secretos más preciados! Es hora de que el Abismo recuerde que las brujas también pueden sangrar».
languages.original_text: "Lately, they have shown arrogance and disrespect toward me. They want to rise in the eyes of the Archon and belittle me. They rank their tasteless flesh dances above my art! They come to my abode to gawk at my treasured secrets! It is time the Chasm was reminded that Wyches, too, can bleed."

traits.locale_text: «Últimamente, han sido arrogantes e irrespetuosas conmigo. Quieren ganarse el favor del Arconte y menospreciarme. ¡Consideran sus insulsas obras cárnicas mejores que las mías! ¡Vienen a mi morada a investigar mis secretos más preciados! Es hora de que el Abismo recuerde que las brujas también pueden sangrar».
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: 「最近やつらは傲慢になり、私を軽視している。アーコンの目の前で立ち上がり、私を侮辱しようと考えているんだ。自分たちの無味乾燥な肉体のダンスを私の芸術よりも上だと勘違いしている！やつらは私の住処まで来て、秘密を覗き見ようとしてるんだ！裂け目ではウィッチの血が流れることもあるのだということを思い知らせてやろう！」
languages.original_text: "Lately, they have shown arrogance and disrespect toward me. They want to rise in the eyes of the Archon and belittle me. They rank their tasteless flesh dances above my art! They come to my abode to gawk at my treasured secrets! It is time the Chasm was reminded that Wyches, too, can bleed."

traits.locale_text: 「最近やつらは傲慢になり、私を軽視している。アーコンの目の前で立ち上がり、私を侮辱しようと考えているんだ。自分たちの無味乾燥な肉体のダンスを私の芸術よりも上だと勘違いしている！やつらは私の住処まで来て、秘密を覗き見ようとしてるんだ！裂け目ではウィッチの血が流れることもあるのだということを思い知らせてやろう！」
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: "Son zamanlarda bana karşı ukala ve saygısızca davranmaya başladılar. Arkon'un gözünde yükselmek ve beni hor görmek istiyorlar. Kendi zevksiz et danslarını benim sanatımın üstünde sayıyorlar! Değerli sırlarıma şahit olmak için mekânıma geliyorlar! Yarık'a Viçlerin de kanının akabildiğinin hatırlatılmasının zamanı geldi."
languages.original_text: "Lately, they have shown arrogance and disrespect toward me. They want to rise in the eyes of the Archon and belittle me. They rank their tasteless flesh dances above my art! They come to my abode to gawk at my treasured secrets! It is time the Chasm was reminded that Wyches, too, can bleed."

traits.locale_text: "Son zamanlarda bana karşı ukala ve saygısızca davranmaya başladılar. Arkon'un gözünde yükselmek ve beni hor görmek istiyorlar. Kendi zevksiz et danslarını benim sanatımın üstünde sayıyorlar! Değerli sırlarıma şahit olmak için mekânıma geliyorlar! Yarık'a Viçlerin de kanının akabildiğinin hatırlatılmasının zamanı geldi."
